comments.body: Will orders ship after everything has been sold or on an individual basis? No rush just curious when my order would go out.

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: Quote from: Bullion-n-BTC on May 26, 2022, 08:52:58 PMWill orders ship after everything has been sold or on an individual basis? No rush just curious when my order would go out. Good question. A little of both. Usually, it would be on an individual basis. However, upon official releases and other special sales (like this one), we often get hit with several orders at one time, then we wait a day or two until all payments have arrived before we drop off the orders in a large batch to the PO. Unfortunately, sometimes that one or two days of wait time will slowly turn into two or three days, then three or four days, etc. Eventually, we ship all paid orders without waiting for all the payments to come in. That deadline is usually about one week. For this particular collection of orders, that one week deadline is today, so all remaining paid orders will ship first thing Monday morning. I hope that helps to explain our unofficial, odd, likely illogical, and ever-changing shipping system. Chris@TBPCo.

comments.body: UPDATE: Out of the original 25 Bitcoin Penny® T.K.O. Tactical Knuckle Offline Wallets, several were engraved a little wonky. Either the engraving depth was shallow on one side and deep on the other, or so shallow in small areas that bits of the text were absent. Regardless, we originally only sold the good quality pieces. The remaining pieces were set aside for a future "factory seconds" sale. However, boxed and out of sight, we had totally forgotten about them until chatting with a friend yesterday. This morning, I dug out the box of factory seconds, took a quick photo of the uneven / wonky engraving, and am now offering them for sale at 40% OFF with free worldwide shipping. Please let me know if you're interested in a set or two.The sale price is $130 USD or the equivalent in cryptocurrency. NOTE: These pieces are cross-listed in the original TKO thread.PM for more information.Regards,Chris@TBPCo.
